tests.name: "multiple occurrences of a word"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "one fish two fish red fish blue fish"

tests.name: "ignore punctuation"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "car: carpet as java: javascript!!&@$%^&"

tests.name: "normalize case"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "go Go GO Stop stop"

tests.name: "with apostrophes"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "First: don't laugh. Then: don't cry."

tests.name: "with quotations"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "Joe can't tell between 'large' and large."

tests.name: "substrings from the beginning"
tests.cmd: bash word_count.sh "Joe can't tell between apple, app and a."

tests.name: "multiple spaces not detected as a word"
"alternating word separators are not detected as a word"
